thread.title: 50th Birthday Celebration
thread.title_full: 50th Birthday Celebration - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lynn M
title: 50th Birthday Celebration
text:
We had an awesome time at The Royal Park. Great staff, very friendly, very clean and good food. I can"t thank the staff enough for their generous hospitality and making my 50th Birthday Celebration very special. The Royal Park is home to us and the staff is family. Thank you all again ,
See all photos
